MineralSite.name: NI 43-101 Technical Report for the Cobequid Highlands project in Canada dated November, 2020

document.title: NI 43-101 Technical Report for the Cobequid Highlands project in Canada dated November, 2020
document.description: This Technical Report by AMK Geoscience Ltd. covers the Cobequid Highlands Property for Spark Minerals Inc. to support a potential listing on a Canadian exchange.
